article_title: Airborne Broadband on Airliners Projected to Expand Sharply
article_text:
LONG BEACH, Calif.—Broadband connectivity for airline passengers and crews is projected to expand sharply over the next few years, but experts told an aerospace conference the profitability of such services remains uncertain for carriers.

The number of commercial aircraft equipped for broadband communication links is expected to quadruple world-wide over the next decade, according to data presented on Tuesday to an aerospace conference here. By 2023, about 13,000 commercial aircraft are expected to have such airborne...

article_summary:
By 2023, about 13,000 commercial aircraft are expected to have such airborne...
LONG BEACH, Calif.—Broadband connectivity for airline passengers and crews is projected to expand sharply over the next few years, but experts told an aerospace conference the profitability of such services remains uncertain for carriers.
The number of commercial aircraft equipped for broadband communication links is expected to quadruple world-wide over the next decade, according to data presented on Tuesday to an aerospace conference here.
